mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (member_code, member_name, id, password, email, phone, dob, address, isMember, grade_code) values (nextmemcode(), #{memberName}, #{id}, password(#{password}), #{email}, #{phone}, #{dob}, #{address}, #{isMember}, #{gCode.gradeCode});
mapper.select: select * from tbl_member where id = #{id} and password = #{password}
